long_description: The weather- and sweat-proof X-1 Momentum Ultra Light headphones offer a comfortable and secure in-ear fit with an ultra-small design that doesn't crimp on premium sound. Designed to withstand heavy perspiration, these headphones can be used in all types of weather; simply rinse them off after use for a fresh, clean fit. In-line remote is compatible with iPods and iPhones, allowing control of volume and playback, as well as placing or receiving calls and activating SIRI. Includes 4 ear tip sizes to provide a customizable fit that keeps headphones in place during even the most rigorous of activities. The X-1 Momentum Ultra Light headphones feature a reflective, tangle-resistant cord that enhances visibility while working out or running in low light.
short_description: The weather- and sweat-proof X-1 Momentum Ultra Light headphones offer a comfortable and secure in-ear fit with an ultra-small design that doesn't crimp on premium sound.
